title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Coordinating your inner and outer worlds is not an impossible task, but it requires intuition and a sense of rhythm. You strive to balance your personal time with socializing -- and, thankfully, win at both today. Your current happiness depends on understanding why your private and public life each contribute to your overall well-being. Although you wont likely resolve all outstanding issues, it still helps to regain some mental and emotional clarity now. Once you create space to meditate and check in with your heart, you might be ready to share your thoughts. Balance is key and attitude is everything. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
